home.paragraph1: Begin staking, earning, farming, voting, swapping, bridging with our decentralised platform developed by Pixul

explore.stake_paragraph: Earn xPIXUL tokens, governance rights and 0.05% of all swaps from multi-chain in one simple place
explore.farm_paragraph: Earn passive income and the chance to harvest $PIXUL
explore.xpixul_paragraph: View your total amount you're earning and holding. View global voting and voting booth
explore.dex_paragraph: Use our decentralized exchange to swap tokens on our multi-chain DEX

social.social_header: Join our growing communities to discuss Pixul, DeFi and more

home.paragraph2: Describe and write about what we do. Link
home.paragraph3: This is our only treasury wallet address:

pixul_app.title: Earn more by staking PIXUL
pixul_app.paragraph: When your PIXUL is staked in our protocol, you receive xPIXUL in return for voting rights and a fully composable token that can interact with other products in our ecosystem. Your xPIXUL is continuously compoundig, when you unstake you will receive all the originally deposited PIXUL and any additional from fees

liquidity.paragraph1: View and add liquidity tokens on the Pixul pool using the Pixul Liquidity tool. Connect your wallet to begin.

farm.paragraph1: Pixul Farm lets you stake LP tokens to earn greater yields. Connect your wallet to view the APR.
farm.paragraph2: In order to farm with LP tokens, you need to connect your browser wallet (such as <1>Metamask</1>) and <1>Switch to Ethereum Mainnet</1>

staking.paragraph1: Using xPixul staking, you can easily earn more xPixul tokens over time while the blockchain is running. Earn passive income on your xPixul holdings with our APR of 5-9% on our staking.
staking.paragraph2: In order to stake xPixul tokens, you need to connect your browser wallet (such as <1>Metamask</1>) and <1>Switch to Ethereum Mainnet</1>

lottery.paragraph1: This is a simple, non-custodial, proof-of-work random number generation lottery for Pixul. You have the chance to win Pixul tokens by buying tickets with Pixul tokens.
lottery.paragraph2: In order to stake your Pixul tokens, you need to connect your browser wallet (such as <1>Metamask</1>) and <1>Switch to Ethereum Mainnet</1>

about.title: About the Pixul Protocol
about.desc: When your Pixul is swapped in our protocol, you recieve xPIXUL in return for voting rights and a fully composable token that can interact with other products in our ecosystem. Your xPIXUL is continuously compounding, and when you unstake you will receive all the originally deposited PIXUL and any additional from fees.

staking_gov.title: Staking | Governance Token | xPIXUL
staking_gov.paragraph1: xPIXUL is the governance token of Pixul that is based on a vote locking model. The main benefits for xPIXUL users include: receiving staking rewards, marketplace benefits, ecosystem benefits, voting power for emisson allocations, and the opportunity to obtain boosted Pixul farming incentives. As Pixul expands our goal is develop new incentive for xPixul holders.
staking_gov.paragraph2: xPixul is not tradeable on any DEX or CEX, and has no direct value

staking.title: Staking
staking.paragraph1: Users who stake Pixul will receive an APY between 3%-9% depending on the lock period that is selected by the user
staking.paragraph2: Withdraw Fee = 5% when unstaking your xPIXUL

staking_eco.title: Staking Ecosystem Rewards
staking_eco.line1: 80% of all fees go to Pixul Treasury

recieving_pixul.title: How Does a User receive xPIXUL?
recieving_pixul.point1: To receive xPixul, individuals must lock Pixul tokens for a user-defined timeframe. XPixul would enable the user to more advantageous conditions for all interactions with the Pixul protocol.
recieving_pixul.point2: Protocol users can lock their $Pixul tokens for any intervals between 1 week to 5 years.
recieving_pixul.point3: Locking your $Pixul tokens for a longer timeframe yields a greater amount of xPixul. For exmaple, locking 500 $Pixul for 1-year yields 45 Pixul.
recieving_pixul.point4: The amount of xPixul will slowly decrease in the user's decentralized wallet until it reaches 0. This indicates that the lock period has ended and the user can withdraw their $Pixul tokens.
recieving_pixul.point5: xPIXUl is a non-tradable token, for example, you cannot sell xPIXUL tokens.

protocol_rewards.title: Protocol Incentives & Rewards
protocol_rewards.point1: Our protocol income materializes from transaction fees(1/6th of the protocol's 0.3% swap fee) on PixulSwap.
protocol_rewards.point2: Protocol income will be allocated towards an incentive pool that will be distributed to all active participants on the protocol. For example, users which engage with the platform for token exchange services, participate as liquidity providers, or participate in governance will be entitled to receive rewards for their efforts.
protocol_rewards.point3: If a user is holding a minimum os $100 worth of xPIXUL the user will only pay a 3% fee for transactions in the marketplace.

power.title: Pixulated Voting Power
power.point1: 1 xPIXUL = 1 Vote, you're unable to recover the xPIXUL you use for voting and will be removed from circulation
power.point2: xPixul holders can vote once a week on farm emisson allocations
power.point3: xPIXUL holders can vote on protocol improvement proposals through snapshot governance.

exchange.title: PixulSwap | Decentralized Exchange
exchange.desc: PixulSwap Dex provides users in our protocol a simple way to swap tokens on Ethereum by using auto-mated liquidity pools. In a swap, one token is sold to buy another token. The rate of the swap is determined by the AMM with the equation ( X * Y = K )

breakdown.title: Breakdown
breakdown.desc: The breakdown is x = the number of $AAA tokens, y = the number of $BBB tokens, and k is a constant.

liquidity.title: Add Liquidity
liquidity.desc: To participate in a farm, a user will need to become a liquidity provider for the protocol. For users to become liquidity provides a user must stake token pairs (EX: ETH/$Pixul) into our decentralized market-creating pools to provide the necessary liquidity for transactions.

earn.title: Earn
earn.desc: Users who become liquidity providers for the Pixul Protocol help the project by promoting the adoption of PixulSwap and in exchange for Pixul-LP tokens, users will be rewarded with $Pixul tokens. User's rewards will vary depending on the contribution towards the farming pools.

motive.title: Motive
motive.desc: Pixul's goal is to bring liquidity to Ethereum, therefore we will prioritize supporting farming rewards for other protocol tokens that are building on Ethereum. However, eventually supported farming pools and their emissions will be decided by our governance token holders

launch.paragraph1: Start your project the right way, using Pixul's own launch platform.
launch.paragraph2: PixulLaunch allows you to manage your project's initial sales as smooth as possible. Projects will also get listed on PixulSwap instantly.
